grails-app.services.org.kar.grails.jira
Class JiraXmlRpcService

java.lang.Object
  grails-app.services.org.kar.grails.jira.JiraXmlRpcService

class JiraXmlRpcService

Provides a client implementation for the Jira XmlRpcService http://docs.atlassian.com/software/jira/docs/api/rpc-jira-plugin/latest/index.html?com/atlassian/jira/rpc/xmlrpc/XmlRpcService.html

author:
Kelly Robinson
